name: discordant
description: A modern XMPP-based chat client with video/audio streaming support

comments.purpose: This package.json contains ONLY mobile (Capacitor) and build dependencies.
comments.devWorkflow: All development uses Deno. Run 'deno task dev', 'deno task test', etc.
comments.buildDeps: Vite and Svelte plugins needed here for 'deno task build' to work in CI.
comments.devDeps: For dev, Deno accesses these via npm: specifiers (no npm install needed).
comments.ciBuilds: CI needs 'npm ci' before build to install Vite plugins.
comments.nodeModules: node_modules/ is gitignored and auto-generated as needed.
